/*
   AUTHOR: Peeyush yadav
   Problem: http://www.codechef.com/problems/ALMA03
   Using Graph :'( ..... i want n^2 .... try later again
*/
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define f(a,b,c)                for(int a=b;a<c;a++)
#define s(x)                    scanf("%d",&x);
#define sl(x)                   scanf("%lld",&x);
#define p(x)                    printf("%d\n",x);
#define pl(x)                   printf("%lld\n",x);
#define p1d(a,n)                for(int ix=0;ix<n;ix++) printf("%d ",a[ix]); printf("\n");
#define p2d(a,n,m)              for(int ix=0;ix<n;ix++){ for(int jx=0;jx<m;jx++) printf("%d ",a[ix][jx]); printf("\n");}
void input(){
    #ifdef Megamind
            #define DEBUG
            #define TRACE
            #define gc getchar
            freopen("inp.txt","r",stdin);
            //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    #else
            #define gc getchar_unlocked
    #endif
}
#ifdef TRACE
    #define trace1(x)                      cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<endl;
    #define trace2(x,y)                    cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<" | "#y" = "<<y<<endl;
    #define trace3(x,y,z)                  cerr<<__FUNCTION__<<":"<<__LINE__<<": "#x" = "<<x<<" | "#y" = "<<y<<" | "#z" = "<<z<<endl;
#else
    #define trace1(x)
    #define trace2(x,y)
    #define trace3(x,y,z)

#endif
template <class T>
inline void read(T &n){
	n=0;
	char c=gc();
	while( c < '0' || c > '9' ) c =gc();
	while( c >= '0' && c<='9' ){
		n=(n<<3) + (n<<1) + c - 48;
		c=gc();
	}

}
inline ll power(ll a, ll b, ll m) {
    ll r = 1;
    while(b) {
        if(b & 1) r = r * a % m;
        a = (a * a)% m;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return r;
}
inline ll power(ll a, ll b) {
     ll r = 1;
    while(b) {
        if(b & 1) r = r * a ;
        a = a * a;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return r;
}

/*........................................................END OF TEMPLATES...............................................................*/
#define M 1000000007

vector<int> v[202];
int  a[202];
bool flag[202];

int dfs(int i){
	int maxe=a[i];
	flag[i]=1;
	f(j,0,v[i].size())
		if(!flag[v[i][j]]) maxe = max(maxe,dfs(v[i][j]));
	return maxe;
}
int main(){
    input();
    int t;
    s(t);
    while(t--){
        int n;
        s(n);
        f(i,0,n)    sl(a[i]);
        f(i,0,n)
			f(j,i+1,n)
				if(__gcd(a[i],a[j]) > 1){
					v[i].push_back(j);
					v[j].push_back(i);
				}
		ll ans =1;
		f(i,0,n)
			if(!flag[i])
					ans = (ans* dfs(i))%M;
		pl(ans);
		memset(flag,0,sizeof(flag));
		f(i,0,n) v[i].clear();
    }




}
